fullscreen Use Tree NavigationUse Panel Navigation
package

com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream.cache

Interfaces

Cache An interface for cache. 
Cache.Listener Interface definition for a callback to be notified of Cache events. 
CacheDataSource.EventListener Interface definition for a callback to be notified of CacheDataSource events. 
CacheEvictor Evicts data from a Cache. 

Classes

CacheDataSink Writes data into a cache. 
CacheDataSource A DataSource that reads and writes a Cache. 
CacheSpan Defines a span of data that may or may not be cached (as indicated by isCached). 
LeastRecentlyUsedCacheEvictor Evicts least recently used cache files first. 
NoOpCacheEvictor Evictor that doesn't ever evict cache files. 
SimpleCache A Cache implementation that maintains an in-memory representation. 

Exceptions

CacheDataSink.CacheDataSinkException Thrown when IOException is encountered when writing data into sink.
